constantValues: Container for campaign activities and responses, sales literature, products, and lists to create, plan, execute, and track the results of a specific marketing campaign through its life.

definitions.description: Container for campaign activities and responses, sales literature, products, and lists to create, plan, execute, and track the results of a specific marketing campaign through its life.

members.name: campaignId
members.description: Unique identifier of the campaign.

members.name: emailAddress

constantValues: The primary email address for the entity.

members.description: The primary email address for the entity.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a name for the campaign so that it is identified correctly in lists.

members.description: Type a name for the campaign so that it is identified correctly in lists.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: actualEnd

constantValues: Enter the date when the campaign was closed or completed.

members.description: Enter the date when the campaign was closed or completed.

members.name: actualStart

constantValues: Enter the actual start date and time for the campaign.

members.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the campaign.

members.name: budgetedCost

constantValues: Type the amount budgeted for the campaign to define a limit for how much you can spend.

members.description: Type the amount budgeted for the campaign to define a limit for how much you can spend.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: budgetedCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

members.name: codeName

constantValues: Type a number or other tracking code to identify the campaign. If no value is entered, a code will be generated automatically.

members.description: Type a number or other tracking code to identify the campaign. If no value is entered, a code will be generated automatically.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the campaign, such as the products or services offered or the targeted audience.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the campaign, such as the products or services offered or the targeted audience.

members.name: expectedResponse

constantValues: Type the expected response rate for the campaign as a full number between 0 and 100.

members.description: Type the expected response rate for the campaign as a full number between 0 and 100.

members.name: expectedRevenue

constantValues: Type the expected revenue for the campaign for return on investment projections and post-campaign reporting.

members.description: Type the expected revenue for the campaign for return on investment projections and post-campaign reporting.

members.name: expectedRevenueBase

constantValues: Value of the Estimated Revenue in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Estimated Revenue in base currency.

members.name: isTemplate

constantValues: Select whether the campaign is a template that can be copied when you create future campaigns.

members.description: Select whether the campaign is a template that can be copied when you create future campaigns.

members.name: message

constantValues: Type the promotional message or marketing copy for the campaign.

members.description: Type the promotional message or marketing copy for the campaign.

members.name: objective

constantValues: Type the objective of the campaign, including products, services, discounts, and pricing.

members.description: Type the objective of the campaign, including products, services, discounts, and pricing.

members.name: otherCost

constantValues: Type the sum of any miscellaneous campaign costs not included in the campaign activities to make sure the actual cost of the campaign is calculated correctly.

members.description: Type the sum of any miscellaneous campaign costs not included in the campaign activities to make sure the actual cost of the campaign is calculated correctly.

members.name: otherCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Miscellaneous Costs in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Miscellaneous Costs in base currency.

members.name: promotionCodeName

constantValues: Type a promotional code to track sales related to the campaign or allow customers to redeem a discount offer.

members.description: Type a promotional code to track sales related to the campaign or allow customers to redeem a discount offer.

members.name: proposedEnd

constantValues: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to end.

members.description: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to end.

members.name: proposedStart

constantValues: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to start.

members.description: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to start.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows the status of the campaign. By default, campaigns are active and can't be deactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Campaign' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows the status of the campaign. By default, campaigns are active and can't be deactivated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Campaign' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Select the campaign's status.

members.name: totalActualCost

constantValues: Shows the sum of the amounts entered in the Total Cost of Campaign Activities and Miscellaneous Costs fields.

members.description: Shows the sum of the amounts entered in the Total Cost of Campaign Activities and Miscellaneous Costs fields.

members.name: totalActualCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign in base currency.

members.name: totalCampaignActivityActualCost

constantValues: Shows the sum of the values entered in the Actual Cost field on all campaign activities related to the campaign.

members.description: Shows the sum of the values entered in the Actual Cost field on all campaign activities related to the campaign.

members.name: totalCampaignActivityActualCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign Activities in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign Activities in base currency.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: typeCode

constantValues: Select the type of the campaign.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'typeCode_display' is added to the 'Campaign' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'typeCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: typeCode_display

members.description: Select the type of the campaign.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the price list associated with this item to make sure the products associated with the campaign are offered at the correct prices.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the price list associated with this item to make sure the products associated with the campaign are offered at the correct prices.
